name: Fantasiant
description:
You enjoy a simple and beautiful life. It was supposed to be like this forever.

You suddenly find yourself facing an unknown landscape. You learn that the inhabitants of Fantasiant have summoned you ... they even call you the great "Hero" and ask you to collect the magical gems scattered on their lands before they release powerful and dangerous energy.

FEATURES:

- each level has its own help included (help button "?" on the top left)

- 3 destinations of Fantasiant to play (green world, fire world, and candy world)

- Each level of the game is different, you will have fun solving all the puzzles of this adventure.

- No advertising in the game.

- You can play offline.

- Help is available for each level in the game and step-by-step walkthrough video are available on our youtube channel (https://www.youtube.com/user/Ylline)

- Buy the full version with one click
